titleStmt.title: J.W. Tripp v. Territory of Washington. Order of the court

bibl.title: J.W. Tripp v. Territory of Washington. Order of the Court
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Jefferson County Third Judicial District Court

body.p: Territory of Washington } ss County of Jefferson
To John H. Woodly Sheriff of Jefferson County W.T. Greeting:

In the name of the United States we command you that you have the body of J.W. Tripp by you imprisoned and detained as it is said, together with the time and cause of such imprisonment and detention by whatever name said J.W. Tripp shall be called as charged before the Hon. C.B. Darwin Judge of the U.S. District Court at the Court Room of the county of Jefferson on the fourth day of June AD 1864 at 12 oclock noon of that day, to do and receive what shall then and there court considered concerning the said J.W. Tripp
And have you then and there this writ

Witness the Hon C.B. Darwin Judge of the said Court in the court room thereof in the cause of Jefferson this fourth day of June AD 1864 - Attest my hand and the seal of said County this day and year last above written

Served the original process of which the within is a true copy by delivering said original to John H. Woodly Sheriff of Jefferson county at Port Townsend, Jefferson County WT at fifteen minutes past ten o'clock A.M. this 4th day of June AD 1867
